subject: feat: implement iframe embed mode with multi-chart and theme support
body:
Add ?embed=<chart-id> URL parameter support. When present, the dashboard
renders only the requested chart(s) with no header, tabs, sidebar, or
debug banner. Supports comma-separated IDs (?embed=id1,id2) for multiple
charts in a single iframe, and ?theme=light|dark for theme override.

New EmbedRenderer component maps embed IDs to tab components, renders
only the needed tabs (deduplicated), and uses useLayoutEffect to hide
non-target CollapsibleSections before paint. Invalid IDs show a helpful
error linking to EMBED_REFERENCE.md.

Build: 61 modules, 497KB JS, 51KB CSS (unchanged from before).

https://claude.ai/code/session_01FQWKFpGxdXJth6d6oA8E8S
title: implement iframe embed mode with multi-chart and theme support
